text: KURU (89.1 FM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Silver City, New Mexico. The station is owned by Gila / Mimbres Community Radio. It airs a variety radio format. The station was assigned the KURU call letters by the Federal Communications Commission on April 10, 2011. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * URU (FM) Category:Radio stations established in 2014 Category:2014 establishments in New Mexico Category:Variety radio stations in the United States Category:Grant County, New Mexico
title: KURU (FM)
